Municipal Court

City of Seagraves Municipal Court

Hours

Monday through Friday
8:00 AM to 12:00 PM
1:00 PM to 5:00 PM
(806) 387-3437

Payments

Seagraves Municipal Court is proud to accept online citation payments! You can now pay your traffic tickets online using a credit card or debit card!

Go to: Seagraves Court Payments

Please Note

If you fail to respond to the court appearance date shown on your citation, an additional charge will be filed against you for violating your written promise to appear, and a warrant will be issued for your arrest. Also, if you fail to appear in court as required by law, you may be denied the renewal of your driver’s license and assessed an additional fee.

Calvin Sellers
Judge

205 Conners Ave
PO Box 37
Seagraves, TX 79359
municipaljudge@seagravestx.us
